originalText: ::You approach the motionless body. The awful stench repels you; curiosity attracts you.::

::You inspect the grim scene: This poor soul's legs have been caught between concrete and metal, crushed from knees down. He's skinny to the bone, pale as chalk, or more fittingly, pale as a corpse - but he doesn't appear to be one just yet. His lips, more reminiscent of cracked plaster than flesh, open slowly to release a hollow groan.::

::He attempts to say something, but a hiss is all he is able to produce. He tries again, and again, until...::

H-Help... fi-fin-ally... ::He smiles wide, tearing his lips further.:: Th-ank... th...
::He closes his eyes, his smile still in place, but it soon fades - just like his life. His face relaxes, and the scene reverts to the way it appeared when you first approached it.::
